backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with authorization, blob storage mixins, data types (documents, benches, components, users), and initial query methods for test bench access with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, impacted files, components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, profile handling, validation, and data fetching.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions using OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing the root mount node and script loading the main React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with protected routes wrapped in AuthGate and ActorGate, theme provider, and global error boundary.
Empty file placeholder for admin access control component.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a reloadable error UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Ensures backend actor initialization before rendering protected content, showing loading or error states as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Blocks access to protected content until Internet Identity authentication is complete, with loading and error messaging.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Generic draggable list component enabling drag-and-drop reordering with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: React hook managing drag-and-drop ordering state and logic for lists.
Layout wrapper with navigation, theme toggle, logout handling, and scroll shortcuts; renders child routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows scroll-to-top and scroll-to-bottom buttons based on scroll position and performs smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Single-value tag input with add/remove behavior, suggestion dropdown, and basic validation handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Grid selector for predefined avatar images with visual highlighting and click-to-select behavior.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar from predefined or custom sources with cache-busting and size options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
Zustand store generating a timestamp used to force cache refreshes for avatar URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Stores and persists the selected dashboard chart type in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and status tracking.
Periodic heartbeat hook that updates the user's last-seen timestamp via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping actor calls for fetching and mutating test benches, user profiles, roles, settings, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and applying global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that configures React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Displays detailed information for a specific test bench and supports editing, component management, history viewing, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Lists all test benches with search, filtering, navigation, and a modal to add new benches.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal form for creating a new test bench with fields for metadata, tags, documents, photo upload, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Interactive table for adding, editing, and removing bench components while computing expiration status and emitting changes upward.
Manages document uploads, versions, associations, and deletions for a bench across predefined categories with progress tracking.
Displays a sorted list of bench history entries with user info, timestamps, and optional details.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error fallbacks using an ExternalBlob URL.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Allows selecting document categories and attaching files with version metadata, supporting add/remove operations.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal form for editing bench metadata, photo, tags, and validation before submitting updates.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Tag input component enabling free-form tag creation, deletion, and selection from suggestions.
Placeholder page describing upcoming features for creating a new test bench.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Computes component expiration status counts and renders them as a pie chart. Shows OK, expiring soon, and expired distribution across all benches.
Aggregates component status counts with optional bench filtering and displays them in a bar chart. Visualizes OK, expiring soon, and expired totals.
Buckets components by time-to-expiration based on a selectable range and displays the counts in a bar chart. Supports filtering by bench and multiple time-range presets.
Counts documents by category and displays the distribution as a pie chart. Shows category proportions or a fallback message if empty.
Groups component expirations by month and displays the last 12 months as either a bar or line chart. Handles empty data with a fallback view.
Calculates expired component counts per bench and charts the top benches using a bar or line chart. Filters out benches with zero expired components.
Computes overall OK, expiring soon, and expired percentages and renders progress bars summarizing system-wide component health. Falls back when no components exist.
Renders draggable dashboard statistic and chart cards using saved order from localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Builds the main dashboard, loading benches, components, documents, computing expiration stats, and supporting section reordering.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages user profile editing including thresholds, avatar selection, validation, and saving preferences.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Displays login UI using Internet Identity with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and converts the default bench placeholder image into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Downloads a document by converting an ExternalBlob to a browser file download.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Handles expiration threshold settings and computes component expiration status.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates simple unique IDs from timestamps and random data.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Applies heuristic text normalization and formatting to bench descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Searches test benches by matching query terms against multiple bench fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains validation helpers for email, domain-specific email, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related tooling, enabling ESNext modules and bundler resolution for vite.config.ts.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variables, path aliases, dev server proxying, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Defines project state, known issues, and feature requests related to entity tag saving and profile photo refresh behavior.
